check.name: TextBlockGoogleStyleFormatting
check.description:
Checks correct format of Java Text Blocks as specified in Google Java Style Guide.

This Check has two functions: first is to make sure that both opening and closing quotes (***) text block are on new lines(no other item should precede the quotes) and second is to ensure opening and closing quotes are vertically aligned. Note: Closing quotes can be followed by further code on the same line.
